import React, { useEffect ,useRef,useState} from 'react' import { useContext } from "react"; import noteContext from "../context/noteContext"; import NoteItems from './NoteItems'; import AddNote from './AddNote'; const Notes = () => { const Context = useContext(noteContext) const{notes,getnotes} = Context const ref = useRef(null) const [note, setNote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) useEffect(() => { getnotes() // eslint-disable-next-line }, []) const onchange = (e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const updateNote = (currentnote) =>{ ref.current.click() setNote(currentnote) } return ( <>
Edit Note

Your Notes

{notes.map((notes)=>{ return })}
) } export default Notes
